articleContent:
During the event, claim a total of Astrite x1600, Avatar: Come On, Smile, and other rewards via in-game mail.

✦Duration✦
 2026-2-17 00:00 - 2026-3-19 03:59 (UTC+8)

✦Rewards✦
[Astrite x800, Customized Squeezy Jelly x1]
Time of Reward Issuance: 2026-02-17 00:00 (UTC+8) - Before Next Version Update Maintenance

[Astrite x400, Old Music Record x1]
Time of Reward Issuance: 2026-02-18 00:00 (UTC+8) - Before Next Version Update Maintenance

[Astrite x400, Avatar: Come On, Smile x1]
Time of Reward Issuance: 2026-02-19 00:00 (UTC+8) - Before Next Version Update Maintenance

✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 2.

✦Rules✦
- The rewards will be issued to your in-game mailbox in stages, on the dates specified above.
- During the event, reach Union Level 2 and unlock the Mail feature to unlock the rewards. The rewards will remain claimable via in-game mail until the next version update maintenance. Don't forget to claim them.
